title: If the area between the river bank and blue flood line forms part of the entire plot in Development Zone, then, FSI of such part of land may be allowed to be utilised on the remaining land
clause_text: If the area between the river bank and blue flood line forms part of the entire plot in Development Zone, then, FSI of such part of land may be allowed to be utilised on the remaining land.
section: Construction within Blue and Red Flood Line

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
